code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{createEvent}from'../api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EventForm=()=>{const[description,setDescription]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();await createEvent(description);setDescription('');alert('Evento criado com sucesso!');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Criar Novo Evento"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Descri\xE7\xE3o do evento",value:description,onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Criar"})]});};export default EventForm;
